Name: Contact us
AntiForgery: enabled
Author: Richard Garside of NogginBox & Aaron Rhoades of East Watch Services
Website: http://orchardcontactus.codeplex.com/
Version: 1.0
OrchardVersion: 1.1
Description: Adds a contact us page to your website.
Features:
    EWSNoggin.ContactUs:
        Description: Adds a contact us page to your website.
        Dependencies: Orchard.Email
        Category: Messaging
